main event: Four to five spherical-shaped objects were seen flying at high speed over the northern coast of Iceland.
interesting points: The objects were reported from two separate locations., They were white in color and moving faster than any known aircraft., No trails were observed from the objects., Sightings lasted about 10-15 seconds., The sighting was made by Lt. Jon Thorvaldsson and confirmed by other observers on the ground.
witness description: Lt. Jon Thorvaldsson, Capt., USAFF and other observers on the ground
